channel.title: How Do you post pics on threads?
channel.description:
Hey Im advertizing my friends server and he wants me to put pics on it. But we both dont know how. Can someone plz explain step by step how to. Thank you.
\~RS_Prodigy~/[br][size=1]Posted on: June 07, 2007, 02:01:54 PM[/size][hr]can som1 plz help me!?!?!?

item.title: How Do you post pics on threads?
item.dc:creator: @mopar_I mopar I
item.description:
@mopar_I wrote:

Go to imageshack/photobucket and upload the pictures there. I use imageshack here is a pic:

take the link on the first line of the bottom row. Ctrl + c then ctrl + v on the forums.

Hope this helps :D.

Read full topic
item.source: How Do you post pics on threads?

item.title: How Do you post pics on threads?

item.description:
@Project_Gamma wrote:

go to photobuket register add and photo and the copy the (img)(/img) one
